website_summaries.verdict: Retinol cream isn't for everyone, but for those who can use it, this is a highly-effective formula that doesn't contain artificial ingredients like similar formulas by competing brands.
pros: Earns praise for fading dark spots, and smoothing out fine lines
Contains retinol, which is scientifically proven to improve skin tone and texture for most users
Noticeable results are possible in as little as a few weeks
cons: Will possibly leak if you store it sitting upright
Drying, especially for users who are already prone to dry skin

customer_reviews.title: Burned my skin
customer_reviews.text: I use all the Drunk Elephant products and was excited to add this to my facial routine. I was already using another retinol product every other night, so did not think my skin would be too affected by this. However, my skin flaked off within a few days and I had very raw and red skin on my cheekbone area. Additionally, I had a lot of irritation on my neck. I kept wondering if it was something else with my skin, so I tried to use this over the course of a few months with the same result each time. While I would recommend every other DE product, this is not one of them.
customer_reviews.author: E. Scanlon

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is worth the money. I’ve noticed a major improvement in discoloration and texture. My skin has a glow, without makeup. I did get some peeling and irritation when I used it consecutive days in a row. I recommend skipping a day between application.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drunk Elephant works
customer_reviews.text: A good start to introduce your skin to retinol. I love Drunk Elephant products because they omits toxic ingredients. For beginners don't apply too much of this product. Mix it with the B-Hydra serum so your skin won't be too dry. I wish they put the cream in pump bottles instead of tubes. It tends to get messy when you accidentally squeeze the product too much.
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Krisla

customer_reviews.title: Yikes
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of retinoids in my time, including a prescription for Retin A, but nothing I've used in the past has caused the flaking and irritation that this does. If I continue to use it, it will be on a very limited...once in a blue moon...basis
customer_reviews.author: Diana L Zinn

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about two weeks. I have noticed a reduction in lip lines and also lines on my forehead, and also a smoothness to my skin. I have not used any retinol product for the last seven years. I am pleased with it and will continue using it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Frischer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the product three times over the last two weeks. I mix the Retinol cream with the B-hydra Intensive Hydration Serum. I have read a lot about the Retinol cream and my understanding was it could cause redness and peeling if used to often to start with.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Estep

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is worth the price which when compared to prescription Retinol is quite reasonable. This product works for me and isn’t harsh on skin. I use every other day. A little bit goes a long way. I’m a fan!
customer_reviews.author: E. Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this product for a little over a month, but I am impressed. I have very sensitive skin and I have not had any real peeling or flaking with this product. It also makes my skin feel very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: a celebration of skin beauty
customer_reviews.text: this product works like a fairy godmother. i can feel it working. this is my first committed retinol routine and at first i used it once a week to make sure i could tolerate. not only can i tolerate but i crave the good feeling and look that comes with using. drunk elephant is easily my fave. got a good size sample for my Sephora birthday gift and i havent looked back, or better. :) i am older than ever before but also younger than i will ever be again and drunk elephant celebrates this with me. cheers.
customer_reviews.author: Flowerfaery

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and was very excited to get it and start using it. I used it a total of 3 times over 7 days and it did not tingle, burn, peel, or slough. What it did do was have me running to the store to get some very intensive moisturizing lotion. This made my face so dry (with no peel or slough EVER) that people commented on my face as in "what's happening to your face"? Do yourself a favor add $50 bucks to this and get your derm to give you the real stuff.
customer_reviews.author: eva gayton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This retinol cream is really excellent. I had heard a lot of people recommending it and just didn’t believe it could be that great. I’m glad to say I was proven wrong. The product is amazing. I had just spent $150 a few months before on a 45 day retinol program which was good but only lasted 45 days and then done. This was half the price and much more product and it’s very strongly I do use it with the free sample size of thdclAla cream"
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE COSTA

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a difference within two weeks of using this! Definitely follow the guidelines for slowly introducing this product and only use every other day or every few days if you have some dryness.
customer_reviews.author: Nkoseski

customer_reviews.title: rash
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted this to work. Love the company's philosophy. Followed all instructions. But I finally realized after ~4-5 uses that it's been the culprit of a burning rash all over my neck. I'd love to return it, or even exchange for another of their products, but I used so infrequently that it's past the 30 day limit. Wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: skb

customer_reviews.title: Another DE winner
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent. I did have to start slowly and now use it twice or thrice per week. I don't have any problems with the packaging but do think the other types of packaging are better (creams/serums).
customer_reviews.author: marcella

customer_reviews.title: Good if not better than doctor-sold brands
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used doctor-sold products over the past 10 years, but I decided to give this a try due to its award winning reviews. So far so good. It works as good if not better than other brands and is less expensive. I’m on my second week, so time will tell if it poops out. So far I’m happy for trying something new and I don’t have to pay the expensive rates at my doctor office.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Dweller

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: What a difference in my skin. Started slowly as advised and now I use 3 times a week. My skin never looked better!
customer_reviews.author: Oldfarmchick

customer_reviews.title: Best skincare ever
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and have tried so many product lines. This one really works. It is costly but I am worth the investment. This is my go to product line. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Marek

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t do much for my skin but the worst thing about this product is the packaging. If there’s any type of movement to the tube, you better expect to have an excessive amount of product to bulge out of the opening to no return this wasting SO MUCH PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Best retinol I've ever tried! I've been using deti ok since age 19 and it's paid off. But this is the holy Grail product. Mix with a mositurizer, like a face oil, and use 2-3 times a week. I see real results. Don't forget spf and Vit. C the next day b/c your skin will be sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: These products really work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have used many products over the years and have used these for the last 6 months...nothing I have used compared to the results...love my skin and have had 5 people ask me if I've had work done!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Stevens Mauer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!!
customer_reviews.text: Really great amazing product. It burns a little on my skin so I started using it every few days. I can now finally use it daily and I see a great difference in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Makes a true difference.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Works as good as Obagi. Every other day is best to prevent peeling.
customer_reviews.author: DevGoods

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It’s fine. I don’t see what all the fuss is about over Drunk Elephant. I’ve been using it for a month and I haven’t seen any real improvement in my skin. It does make me peel if I use it every day though
customer_reviews.author: DrNachoM.D.

customer_reviews.title: Price, quality an performance
customer_reviews.text: Expensive an doesn’t last that long. Used to lighten freckles, light wrinkles an light shadow on face. Works good but need to use daily. Can acheive same thing with TCA acids and other retinol.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended...
customer_reviews.text: I will never recommend this product... worst reaction was having dry, redness and severe irritation... I have to take antihistamine for 2 days and still experience itchiness...
customer_reviews.author: Grace Catotal

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the product. A bit thick but first time using this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for make final opinion
customer_reviews.text: Not use to the pealing of my skin. Have to continue to figure how to use in right dosages.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Sure.
customer_reviews.text: Is more gentle than other retinol treatments but was not necessarily special.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Love This
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product. I had never heard of the brand until a friend made me aware of it. So glad I tried it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M. Rao

customer_reviews.title: Burnt my skin
customer_reviews.text: as soon as the product touched my skin it burned my skin, specifically my forehead... if you have sensitive skin don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Cause face to become somewhat dry. Need to purchase a moisturizer with it. Makes my skin smooth and helps remove blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a real difference almost immediately after using this product
customer_reviews.author: Snow White

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a week now and I have noticed a different type of glow in my skin so excited to see what the weeks to come offer☺️ Worth the try!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Richards

customer_reviews.title: First time retinol user
customer_reviews.text: I've been really happy with this product, it does cause some minor surface drying which I guess is to be expected with a retinol cream. The results are worth a little drying and sensitivity. Honestly I feel better about my skin now than I have in quite awhile. Overall my complexion looks brighter with a noticeable decrease in surface lines, best of all there seems to be an improvement in overall firmness. I would definitely recommend this product, and will be trying other Drunk Elephant products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Allergic to bakuchiol
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I'm allergic to bakuchiol, which i believe is the vegan "retinol" in this product, and why i had a reaction to it. Bakuchiol shows a lot of promise as an anti aging ingredient, but it's not retinol (i.e. it's not a vitamin A derivative). i wish they had specified as much instead of merely listing retinol as the ingredient, as it is not only misleading, but problematic for folks like me. Alas, cosmeceuticals are not FDA regulated, so otc products are a bit of a dice roll. i've since gotten a prescription for tretinoin, the tried and true gold standard in anti aging topicals
customer_reviews.author: L. Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase a product like this, not knowing the manufacturer, but I was VERY pleasantly surprised to find that it is awesome! I did notice some flaking on my face after about two weeks, but from what I read, this is normal. The flaking stopped after a few days. What I noticed only after a few days was that my face appeared brighter and it appeared to look more healthy and not so tired and drained looking. I will continue to use this product for a long time! Worth every dollar spent!
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the drunk elephant brand. It doesn't matter what product of theirs I use , I always get wonderful results. On this particular retinol cream you get minimal peeling and maximum results. I have found that I have no problem with using this on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I had read that it was wise to be careful and to be honest I have seen little difference after two months. Not sure it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Pack

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Prescription Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is strongest I’ve ever used! I had to cut back bc I was using every night and ended up being a bit too strong. So I know it’s good stuff! I’m very happy I bought this and will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Hashemi

customer_reviews.title: It actually works.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff actually works. I'm noticing diminished crows feet and frown lines, especially on my forehead. You have to use a moisturizer with it or your skin will peel. But hey, if it gets rid of wrinkles, I'm all in.
customer_reviews.author: ETG

customer_reviews.title: The best ever!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I dont bbn like about this product. It does exactly what I wanted it to do. I'm in the snow period at this moment, but loving it just the same. The skin under the peeling is smooth n soft, just like a new born baby. I will never have this out of my arsenal, ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Jaynie Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Burned my face!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a sensitive skin but yet this cream burned my skin! I have red roots all over my face! My skin is very dry and irritated! Will never use it again !
customer_reviews.author: mms

customer_reviews.title: Drunk Elephant Retinol the Best
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Mixed with a Drunk Elephant serum (Vitamin B) and the results in the morning were noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to retin A
customer_reviews.text: I use this interchangeably with my prescription Retin A, and it really helps with overdrying and harshness to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Burned my face
customer_reviews.text: I do not have sensitive skin and this product burned my face, caused a rash and my eyes to swell.
customer_reviews.author: Amy McVey

product_meta.title: Drunk Elephant A-Passioni Retinol Anti-Wrinkle Cream. Brightening, Restorative and Vegan Face Cream with Vitamin F. 1 Ounce.
product_meta.description:
THE DRUNK ELEPHANT DIFFERENCE
With a mission to deliver clinically-effective, clean skincare products formulated with both cutting-edge synthetic and natural ingredients, Drunk Elephant knows that every ingredient should directly benefit the health of your skin or the safety of the formulation. 

 A-PASSIONI
A daily dose of nourishing vitamins for your complexion, this cream infuses passionfruit, apricot, marula and jojoba oils to nourish and moisturize your skin, while kale,winter cherry, and xanthophylls protect against environmental stressors. 

 Suggested Use: We recommend applying a pea-size amount (or less) to a clean, dry face, avoiding the eye area. Limit initial use to once or twice a week, day or night, gradually increasing frequency to every other night, and then every night as tolerated. Always use a broad spectrum sunscreen. 

 NO FRAGRANCE
After carefully balancing the best ingredients available, Drunk Elephant doesnt have to add anything to mask their natural scents. When you smell their products, you will likely detect nothing but a glycerin base with slight hints of Marula oil, Zinc Oxide, Thermal Mud, Fruit Enzymes, and Vitamins for a refreshing and reassuring scent. 

 COMMITTED TO CLEAN
Drunk Elephant is committed to using only clean ingredients that either directly benefit the skins health, or support the integrity and effectiveness of their formulas. Youll never find the Suspicious 6 (Essential Oils, Drying Alcohols, Silicones, Chemical Screens, Fragrances/Dyes and SLS) in their products.
feature_bullets: A-PASSIONI. Like a fresh start, A-Passioni restores your skin to its most youthful state. With vegan and gluten-free ingredients, this cream nourishes your skin while also fighting deep wrinkles and fine lines. Whats left is a vibrant complexion with bounce and clarity.

THE PERFECT COMBO. Like two peas in a pod, Vitamin F and Retinol create wondrous results. Vitamin F works to improve your skins texture while helping to calm signs of sensitivity, while retinol dramatically improves uneven skin tone.

NO QUESTION IN QUALITY. A routine is only as good as its worst product, and a product is only as good as its worst ingredient. Drunk Elephant is dedicated to your internal health and external skin health; "If there's any DOUBT, it's OUT.

SENSITIVE VS. SENSITIZED. When skin is exposed to irritants and sensitizers, damage can be imperceptible and cumulative, leaving it in a reactive mode. "Sensitive" skin is often just skin that has become sensitized over time by harsh additives

MADE IN THE USA. Drunk Elephant doesnt take shortcuts or compromise ingredients to save money. They are hands-on and will stay true to their ethos. Their products are designed, tested, and made in the United States. Drunk Elephant is certified cruelty-free, they have never, nor will ever, animal test or allow products to be tested on animals.
